name: Spirit Guide Crucible
description:
Enter the Crucible, a walled-in arena where you fight face-hugging spiders and blood-sucking worms, terrifying mechanised golems, bomb carrying grunts, and the ever present Summoners, which must be destroyed before the stream of enemies can be turned off and you can progress…and finally escape!

* Mix of action and arcade gameplay
* Play with gamepad or Oculus Touch controllers
* Exciting in-game music
* High Score system
